bitenum.description: User Wait State Mode. The NWAITS[3:0] is used for the FRAM wait state.
Auto mode. The NWAITS[3:0] is ignored. Wait states are generated automatically by the internal FRAM controller state machine.
Disable Write Protection. Write to FRAM memory is allowed.
Enable Write Protection. Write to FRAM memory is not allowed. In case a write access is attempted, the WPIFG (Write Protection Flag) bit will be set.

bitfield.description: Enable Power Up Clear (PUC) reset for the uncorrectable bit error detection flag (UBDIFG)

bitenum.description: PUC not initiated on uncorrectable bit error detection flag.
PUC initiated on uncorrectable bit error detection flag. Generates vector in SYSRSTIV. Clear the UBDIE bit.

bitfield.description: Enable NMI event for the uncorrectable bit error detection flag (UBDIFG)

bitenum.description: Disable NMI for the uncorrectable bit error detection flag (UBDIFG).
Enable NMI for the uncorrectable bit error detection flag (UBDIFG). Generates vector in SYSSNIV. Clear the UBDRSTEN bit.

bitfield.description: Enable NMI event for the correctable bit error detection flag (CBDIFG)

bitenum.description: Disable NMI for the correctable bit error detection flag (CBDIFG).
Disable NMI for the correctable bit error detection flag (CBDIFG). Generates vector in SYSSNIV.

bitfield.description: Enable NMI event for the Write Protection Detection flag (WPIFG)

bitenum.description: Disable NMI for the Write Protection Detection flag (WPIFG).
Enable NMI for the Write Protection Detection flag (WPIFG). Generates vector in SYSSNIV.

bitfield.description: Enable NMI event for the Access time error flag (ACCTEIFG)

bitenum.description: Disable NMI for the Access time error flag (ACCTEIFG).
Enable NMI for the Access time error flag (ACCTEIFG). Generates vector in SYSSNIV.
Interrupt pending. Can be cleared by writing '0' or by reading SYSSNIV when it is the highest pending interrupt.
Interrupt pending. Can be cleared by writing '0' or by reading SYSSNIV when it is the highest pending interrupt.

bitfield.description: FRAM uncorrectable bit error detection flag

bitenum.description: Interrupt pending. Can be cleared by writing '0' or by reading SYSSNIV when it is the highest pending interrupt.

bitfield.description: FRAM correctable bit error detection flag

bitenum.description: Interrupt pending. Can be cleared by writing '0' or by reading SYSSNIV if it is the highest pending interrupt.
